verses.verse: I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> at my <S%H4931>watch,<s%> and <S%H3320>set<s%> myself on the <S%H4692>ramparts,<s%> and will <S%H7200>look<s%> out to <S%H7200>see<s%> what he will <S%H1696>say<s%> to <S%H7725>me,<s%> and what I will answer concerning my <S%H8433>complaint.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3789>me,<s%> "Write the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and make it <S%H874>plain<s%> on <S%H3871>tablets,<s%> that he who <S%H7323>runs<s%> may read <S%H7121>it.<s%>

For the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is yet for the appointed <S%H4150>time,<s%> and it hurries toward the <S%H7093>end,<s%> and <S%H6315>won't<s%> prove <S%H3576>false.<s%> Though it takes <S%H4102>time,<s%> <S%H4102>wait<s%> for <S%H935>it;<s%> because it will surely <S%H935>come.<s%> It <S%H309>won't<s%> delay.
<S%H5315>Behold,<s%> his soul is puffed <S%H6075>up.<s%> It is not <S%H3474>upright<s%> in <S%H6662>him,<s%> but the righteous will <S%H2421>live<s%> by his <S%H530>faith.<s%>

<S%H3196>Yes,<s%> moreover, wine is <S%H898>treacherous.<s%> A <S%H3093>haughty<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> who <S%H5115>doesn't<s%> stay at home, who <S%H7337>enlarges<s%> his <S%H5315>desire<s%> as <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> and he is like <S%H4194>death,<s%> and <S%H7646>can't<s%> be satisfied, but <S%H622>gathers<s%> to himself all <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H6908>heaps<s%> to himself all <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

<S%H5375>Won't<s%> all these take up a <S%H4912>parable<s%> against <S%H4426>him,<s%> and a taunting <S%H2420>proverb<s%> against <S%H559>him,<s%> and say, <S%H1945><s%> 'Woe to him who <S%H7235>increases<s%> that which is not <S%H3513>his,<s%> and who enriches himself by <S%H5671>extortion!<s%> How long?'
<S%H5391>Won't<s%> your debtors rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly,<s%> and <S%H3364>wake<s%> up those who make you <S%H2111>tremble,<s%> and you will be their <S%H4933>victim?<s%>

Because you have <S%H7997>plundered<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> all the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will <S%H7997>plunder<s%> <S%H120>you,<s%> because of men's <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H776>land,<s%> to the <S%H7151>city<s%> and to all who dwell in <S%H3427>it.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him who <S%H1214>gets<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1215>gain<s%> for his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that he may <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> that he may be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H7451>evil!<s%>

You have <S%H3289>devised<s%> <S%H1322>shame<s%> to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> by cutting <S%H7096>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
For the <S%H68>stone<s%> will cry <S%H2199>out<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and the <S%H6086>beam<s%> <S%H3714>out<s%> of the woodwork will answer <S%H6030>it.<s%>
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him who <S%H1129>builds<s%> a <S%H5892>town<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H3559>establishes<s%> a <S%H7151>city<s%> by <S%H5766>iniquity!<s%>

<S%H3068>Behold,<s%> isn't it of Yahweh of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> that the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3021>labor<s%> for <S%H1767>the<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H3816>nations<s%> <S%H3286>weary<s%> themselves <S%H1767>for<s%> <S%H7385>vanity?<s%>

For the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H1945>"Woe<s%> to him who gives his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H8248>drink,<s%> <S%H5596>pouring<s%> your inflaming <S%H2573>wine<s%> until they are <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> so that you may <S%H5027>gaze<s%> at their naked <S%H4589>bodies!<s%>

You are <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H7036>shame,<s%> and not <S%H3519>glory.<s%> You will also <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and be <S%H6188>exposed!<s%> The <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s right <S%H3225>hand<s%> will come <S%H5437>around<s%> to <S%H7022>you,<s%> and disgrace will cover your <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

For the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> will <S%H3680>overwhelm<s%> <S%H7701>you,<s%> and the destruction of the <S%H929>animals,<s%> which made them <S%H2865>afraid;<s%> because of <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H776>land,<s%> to every <S%H7151>city<s%> and to those who dwell in <S%H3427>them.<s%>

"What value does the <S%H6458>engraved<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> <S%H3335>have,<s%> that its maker has <S%H6458>engraved<s%> <S%H4541>it;<s%> the molten image, even the <S%H3384>teacher<s%> of <S%H8267>lies,<s%> that he who <S%H3335>fashions<s%> its <S%H3336>form<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H6213>it,<s%> to make <S%H483>mute<s%> <S%H457>idols?<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him who <S%H559>says<s%> to the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H6974><s%> 'Awake!' or to the <S%H1748>mute<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H5782><s%> 'Arise!' Shall this <S%H3384>teach?<s%> <S%H8610>Behold,<s%> it is overlaid with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and there is no <S%H7307>breath<s%> at all in its <S%H7130>midst.<s%>
But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%> Let all the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H2013>silent<s%> before <S%H6440>him!<s%>"
